attributes.title: Syslog Intro
attributes.visState:
{"title":"Syslog Intro","type":"markdown","params":{"fontSize":10,"openLinksInNewTab":false,"markdown":"Use the [Syslog Dashboard](#/dashboard/ac6e6490-3021-11e8-9faf-f77fbc81a50d) to explore this data

Syslog data is loaded via the following methods:
* Files in the `/logstash/syslog/` directory.
  * NOTE: Create e.g. `/logstash/syslog/2015/` for files that should be loaded as if they are from the year 2015.
* Network syslog messages sent to UDP or TCP port 5514
  * NOTE: Open the firewall ports using the `fw_modify.sh` script.  For example:
    * `fw_modify.sh -a open -p 5514 -r udp`
    * `fw_modify.sh -a open -p 5514 -r tcp`
    * [filebeat](https://www.elastic.co/products/beats/filebeat) messages sent to TCP 5044
  * NOTE: Open the firewall ports using the `fw_modify.sh` script.  For example:
    * `fw_modify.sh -a open -p 5044 -r tcp`
    * Network RELP messages sent to TCP 5516
  * NOTE: Open firewall ports using the `fw_modify.sh` script.  For example:
    * `fw_modify.sh -a open -p 5516 -r tcp`"},"aggs":[]}
